title: U.S. and Canada border to close to all but “non-essential” and travel, says Trump
description: The U.S./Canada border has remained open despite measures by both countries to block and limit international flights and mobility in light of the coronavirus pandemic, but that is changing today as the two countries have agreed, “by mutual consent,” to suspen…
